events.event: Foul by Elvis Amoh (Hartford Athletic).

Goal!  Detroit City FC 1, Hartford Athletic 0. Darío Suárez (Detroit City FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Darío Suárez (Detroit City FC) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
